Directions: In a mixing bowl, combine the sugar, pumpkin, applesauce and egg substitute; mix well.  Combine the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, salt and nutmeg; gradually add to pumpkin mixture and mix well.  Stir in nuts or raisins if desired.  Pour into two 8-in. x 4-in. x 2-in. loaf pans coated with nonstick cooking spray.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 50-60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
